doc:
Bernard Punsly https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernard_Punsly 0 Bernard Punsly (July 11, 1923 – January 20, 2004) was a New York City-born American actor who later left show business to become a physician. His last name was often spelled incorrectly in film credits as Punsley. Bernard_Punsly ( July_11_,_1923 – January_20_,_2004 ) was a_New_York_City-born_American_actor who later left show_business to_become a_physician . His_last_name was_often_spelled incorrectly in film_credits as Punsley .
